title: If you could be any champion IRL, which one would you be?
body:
Someone probably already started this, but I haven't seen it, so why not? >.<

I'd probably be TF, since he doesn't have anything overly flashy and would blend in pretty well.

Also being able to teleport wherever I want would be nice.

replies.body:
{{champion:79}} 

nothing changes
Velkoz, because i too would like to be "engrossed with anal" lol damn riot

Look at attached image in the thread (And no, it's not "fan art").
{{champion:57}} I am Groot
I make it a goal every match I play as him to say literally nothing but that
{{champion:16}} Heal the fuck out of anyone who's hurt. And have a pretty horn, too!

"I'm sorry to say, Ms. Espinoza, but the cancer has metastasized...I think if you have any affairs to get in order, you should-"

{{champion:16}} *DING*

"...Even my clipboard is shinier..."

So you're telling me I can be a bear that calls down fucking LIGHTNING to his BEAR HANDS? Move over, Thor. 

{{champion:106}}

{{champion:126}} 

I mean seriously. Dude's built like Gaston.

No-one pushes like Jayce

No one last-hits like Jayce

No one backdoors and pentas from behind like Jayce

There's no-one in Piltover quite as manly

My what a guy that lad Jayce
{{champion:103}}  I would do things... to myself

> {{champion:103}}  I would do things... to myself

ok thats kinda messed up but we all would
So would Cerealboxofdoom
OMG lol is he still yiffing around he?  Haven't seen anything from him since the days of the old forum.
Yep, saw him on one of the boards a few weeks ago
Nice, use to read his threads or scan for ones he derailed, just because he amused me.  Might have to see if i can find him.

{{champion:45}}
#**THE UNIVERSE IS MINE TO COMMAND, TO CONTROL! PHENOMENAL, COSMIC POWAHS!**

https://38.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ly81xpyU731r8pxv5o1_500.gif

######Itty bitty living space.
That's a short joke, isn't it?
Poor Veigar, he is but a footnote in the Compendium of Famous Villians.

{{champion:201}} 

I see no downside besides being bald.
Having that moustache, hair on his head would be too op

I was actually pretending to be Tf yesterday and kept throwing my blue debit card at my friend. Then i found a deck of cards and threw it at him and yelled "STACKED DECK"

this friend also had no idea what i was doing because he doesn't play league.
I am terribly emontional so I'd go with {{champion:112}}. Maybe now the pain will go away...

{{champion:201}}

he is hands down the manliest yet gentlest thing every to be created in the history of anything.

"oh no, a young boy is trapped in the mountain!"

_scratches mustache thoughtfully_

_proceeds to punch through mountain_

Probably {{champion:102}} 

I'm very isolated so the social consequences would be nonexistent, and I could turn into a dragon. I wanna be a dragon.
{{champion:126}}. He is freakin' superhero with a freakin' hammer that turns into a freakin' cannon.
{{champion:432}}  cus bard

I would be Ekko.  Yes, the new guy.  For several reasons.

1.)  He has grit.  Yeah, he was an orphan raised in the slums, but know what? The thing about that is you lived it all your life.  After a while, living it doesn't truly bother you.  What bothers you is trying to reach somewhere else and failing. 

2.) He's resilient and determined.  He gets knocked down once.  He gets right back up.  Taken down again, he'll keep trying no matter what.  Finally defeated the bad guy, but the mural got destroyed. "Fuck..."  Does the fight over again.

3.) He has jokes for days.  Thing about being smart, you are sarcastic, witty, and can be an ass purely by knowing how people work and weak spots.

4.) Because he doesn't need years, months or days.  He just needs a second.

> He just needs a second.

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:134}} Immense power is fun!  You should try it sometime.

{{champion:75}} *SNOOP DOOOOOOOOGG*

Nananana
{{champion:99}} because I am very optimistic, gentle and even maybe a little naive. She is always smiling and determine. Yes, that would be me.
{{champion:154}} would be my champion that I wish to be. Why? Cause For one I'm a superhero, two I'd probably be tapping that {{champion:92}} Although I'm not sure if those two are legitimetely canon

{{champion:115}} 

As someone who grew up without 2 front teeth, I want dem pearly whites nao!

{{champion:150}} 
Gotta go with the mains, first of all: cute factor, wouldn't hurt to be Gnar since there is no downside..well, except the communication barrier but still, small, adorable, and the ability to crush the fuck out of anyone who talks shit about you. Also: Cool ass front flips.

{{champion:117}} 
She just sees the world in such a unique and interesting way

{{champion:99}}  because she is super smart and positive. Sure I could be losing this soccer game 9-0, but I'll still say "Stay positive!" over and over until my teammates kill me. And also a big laser.
